name: Movers
description:
Game Description: 

A shared keyboard co-op (or singleplayer). Control two workers as they try to move boxes into a lovely family's new home. Take care not to drop anything! 

How does the game fit the theme? 

During a time of widespread pandemic, two workers are stuck together doing laborious tasks for a healthcode-violating moving company that is not paying either of them the hazard pay they deserve. They are also literally physically attached to one another via the carrying platform used to move boxes. It's very inefficient. 

Did your team create the vast majority of the art during the 48 hours? 

Yes. 

Did your team create the vast majority of the music during the 48 hours? 

No.

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.
